email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the mid-40s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $48.50 per ton, but that's the best I can do. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 is acceptable. Can we confirm the laycan as 15-20 October and the demurrage rate at $15,000 per day? Also, please send over the full vessel details for our records. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.50 works for you. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day. I’ll send over the full vessel details shortly. Thanks, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We’ll proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the contract is attached for your review. Let me know if you need any changes. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, Sarah
